subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Maykel Galindo scored a goal in the 50th minute on Sunday to give Chivas USA a 2-2 tie with Los Angeles in the opening match of their two-game, total-goals playoff series.
snippet: Maykel Galindo scored a goal in the 50th minute on Sunday to give Chivas USA a 2-2 tie with Los Angeles in the opening match of their two-game, total-goals playoff series.
